Package cz.zcu.fav.kiv.antipatterndetectionapp.detecting.detectors

Interface AntiPatternDetector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusinessAsUsualDetectorImpl, LongOrNonExistentFeedbackLoopsDetectorImpl, NinetyNinetyRuleDetectorImpl, RoadToNowhereDetectorImpl, SpecifyNothingDetectorImpl, TooLongSprintDetectorImpl, VaryingSprintLengthDetectorImpl
    public interface AntiPatternDetector
    This is base interface for all AP detector. In case you need to implement new AP detector you should implements all method correctly, see example TooLongSprintDetector.java

      • analyze

        QueryResultItem analyze​(Project project,
                        DatabaseConnection databaseConnection)
        Most important method of this class for analyzing AP. In this mode queries are sent to the database and then the results are processed based on the results it is decided on the occurrence of AP.
        Parameters:
        project - model class for analyzed project
        databaseConnection - database connection
        Returns:
        model class for results
